## Is your feature request related to a problem?

Describe the problem you are trying to solve. Examples:

- "I'm always frustrated when..."
- "It would be much easier for developers if there was a template for..."

## Describe the solution you'd like

Provide a clear and concise description of the feature you want. If
proposing a new template or document, include a rough outline or example
content.

## Alternatives considered

Describe other approaches or solutions you considered and why they were not suitable.

## Additional context

Add any other context, screenshots, or rationale that would help maintainers
evaluate the request. If your proposal contains sensitive information
(credentials, private URLs, personal data), do not post it publicly â€”
contact the maintainers directly instead.
